message.content:
I need to identify the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of an asset over its useful life in the cash flow statement.

In accounting terms, this is referring to "depreciation" - which is the systematic allocation of the cost of a tangible asset over its useful life.

Looking at the cash flow statement provided, I can see the following line item that matches this description:

"Depreciation" with a value of 45765.70 on 2024-01-29.

This is the specific line item that represents the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of assets over their useful lives.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '45765.70'}}
```
